title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       slid 2.57% to $925.61 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.28% to 5,203.58 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.08% to 39,282.33. The stock's fall snapped a six-day winning streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed $48.39 below its 52-week high ($974.00), which the company reached on March 8th. Trading volume (50.5 M) remained 4.3 million below its 50-day average volume of 54.8 M.
